name: Change Howdy Verbiage – Raineri Software, LLC
author: Zachary Raineri, Raineri Software LLC

sections.description: Easily change the “Howdy” verbiage in the top right corner of your admin screen to anything else you’d like for all users.
sections.installation:
The install is incredibly easy

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/rs-change-howdy-verbiage directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to the new “Raineri Software” tab on the left (all of our plugins will be centralized here for ease of use)
  4. Click the “Change Howdy” sub menu
  5. Input whatever text you’d like to change it to and press “Save Settings”

And you’re all set!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

The install is incredibly easy

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/rs-change-howdy-verbiage directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to the new “Raineri Software” tab on the left (all of our plugins will be centralized here for ease of use)
  4. Click the “Change Howdy” sub menu
  5. Input whatever text you’d like to change it to and press “Save Settings”

And you’re all set!

What does this plugin do?

Allows you to update the “Howdy” verbiage in the top right of the admin screen.

What’s the easiest way to install it?

Simply search “Change Howdy Verbiage” in WordPress’ plugin list and click “Install Now”

How will often you update it?

We will be performing checks for new variations of WordPress and testing our plugin on them every other day to ensure you’re always running properly!

Will it slow down my website?

Not at all! This plugin is extremely light weight and simply does what you want it to.

short_description: Change the "Howdy" text in the top right corner to anything else you'd. Extremely easy to use, light weight and simple plugin.
description: Easily change the “Howdy” verbiage in the top right corner of your admin screen to anything else you’d like for all users.
